      • caculateTotalPrice

        public double caculateTotalPrice()
        Create a caculateTotalPrice to caculate the total price of the purchasing list. Traversal cycle (for loop) to add each value in the ArrayList according to the index into totalPrice.

        Create a displayCart method to display the total number and total price of purchase, and print each product's detailed information.
